title: How to get a mirasol display - Quora

response.answer_text: There are watches and other e-readers coming out with this display .If qualcomm manages to simmer down the cost , then may be we can get more of the IMOD technology around us.Yes, but presently you get it in this product Qualcomm Toq Smartwatch for Android Devices or if you have some contacts in a foundry producing them.You may somehow smuggle some :P
Buy a Qualcomm Toq smartwatch.Qualcomm Toq Smartwatch for Android Devices
